hyper tibble

hyper tibble

hyper_tibble(x, ...)

# S3 method for character
hyper_tibble(x, ...)

# S3 method for tidync
hyper_tibble(x, ...)

# S3 method for hyperfilter
hyper_tibble(x, ...)

Arguments

x

object to tibbulate
...

arguments to `hyper_filter``

Value

a tbl_df

Examples

l3file <- system.file("extdata", "S2008001.L3m_DAY_CHL_chlor_a_9km.nc", package= "ncdump")
rnc <- tidync(l3file)
hyper_filter(rnc)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 2
#>                access
#>                <dttm>
#> 1 2017-08-07 21:37:05
#> # ... with 1 more variables: source <chr>
#> filtered dimension summary: 
#> # A tibble: 2 x 5
#>    name coord_dim        min       max length
#>   <chr>     <lgl>      <dbl>     <dbl>  <int>
#> 1   lon      TRUE -179.95833 179.95836   4320
#> 2   lat      TRUE  -89.95834  89.95834   2160
library(dplyr)
lapply(hyper_slice(l3file, lat = lat > 0, lon = index > 3000), dim)
#> $chlor_a
#> [1] 1320 1080
#> 

 ht <- hyper_tibble(rnc) %>%
 filter(!is.na(chlor_a))
ht
#> # A tibble: 9 x 3
#>    chlor_a      lon       lat
#>      <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 1.801773 170.3750 -75.95834
#> 2 1.801773 170.4584 -75.95834
#> 3 1.801773 170.5417 -75.95834
#> 4 1.801773 170.6250 -75.95834
#> 5 0.800647 165.1250 -77.37501
#> 6 0.800647 165.2084 -77.37501
#> 7 0.800647 165.2917 -77.37501
#> 8 0.800647 165.3750 -77.37501
#> 9 0.800647 165.4584 -77.37501
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(ht %>% filter(!is.na(chlor_a)),
aes(x = lon, y = lat, fill = chlor_a)) + geom_point()
